DOC.brief_title: Anesthetics Prevent Lung Injury Cardiac Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: Randomized , control trial involve 45 adult patient undergoing cardiac surgery cardiopulmonary bypass . Patients randomize receive either inhaled anesthesia sevoflurane total intravenous anesthesia ( TIVA ) propofol maintenance phase cardiac anesthetic . Assessment lung inflammation take place use fiberoptic bronchoscopic sample lung fluid well serum collection exposure cardiopulmonary bypass , incidence compositive postoperative pulmonary complication take place postoperative period .
DOC.criteria: Adult patient ( age 18+ ) Undergoing cardiac surgery cardiopulmonary bypass Emergency surgery History severe COPD , emphysema , ILD Recent ( < 2wk ) current use systemic glucocorticoid Prior history pneumothorax Allergy/contraindication intravenous anesthetic Personal family history malignant hyperthermia high risk malignant hyperthermia
